name: Luck of the draw (Leandro Satoshi, Jonyzim, Abner Santos)
name_original: Luck of the draw (Leandro Satoshi, Jonyzim, Abner Santos)
description:
Test your gambling skills in this shooting game!

Luck of the draw is a game made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Welcome to the Luck of the draw Salon! A place where you can eat and drink to your heart's desire, and of course, test your gambling skill and your aim with our famous game!

But how does the game work you ask? It's a really simple game kiddo, but don't get ahead of yourself thinking it's easy!

First, you need to bet how many targets you need to hit, and this bet is made using some dice, so you better have luck on your side! After you and your opponent have chosen the dice, it's time to roll to decide your goal.

Then finally, it's shooting time! For each hit, you gain one point, and for each miss, you lose one.

And that's about it, Good luck!

Test your luck and your aim in a game against our challengers: the lucky clover, the lucky cat, and the lucky horseshoe.

How to play:
  • Use the mouse and left click to play
Credits:
  • Programming: Abner Santos, Jônatas Lopes
  • Art: Leandro Satoshi, Gustavo Ferreira and Leila Evangelista
